title: Wolf Tooth UDH
content:
Wolf Tooth just announced a Universal Derailleur Hanger today (UDH). Like other made-in-house items from Wolf Tooth, it is fully CNC-machined from aluminum. The Wolf Tooth UDH is compatible with all bikes that are designed for the SRAM UDH, as well as all drivetrains that use a derailleur hanger. The main point that will excite customers is the color options. The bolt and washer on our new UDH match the nine-core Wolf Tooth anodized color choices: raw silver, red, gold, orange, black, olive, blue, ultraviolet purple, and espresso.

Check it out at Wolf Tooth.

The post Wolf Tooth UDH appeared first on The Radavist.
